Description.Text: Contemporary Edwardian Hotel providing guests with fantastic rooms and serviced apartments, all with free hi-speed Internet access, excellent facilities, comfort and convenience matched by excellent rates. The hotel offers bar, barbecue area, concierge, conference facilities, currency exchange, disabled facilities, doctor on call, gym/fitness facilities, Internet access-wireless, lobby, non-smoking rooms, pets allowed, reception, restaurant, room service, safe deposit box, secretarial services, smoke-free hotel and tour desk.

Exit Motorway M40 at junction 4; follow A404 towards High Wycombe town centre. At bottom of the hill, at mini roundabouts, follow signs for Aylesbury (A40), this will bring you onto West Wycombe Road (A40). Buckingham Hotel is located on the Right hand side approximately half mile along West Wycombe road just after the BP garage.

Single - Single room offers one single bed with bathroom amenities, color TV, complementary aromatherapy toiletries, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, HD plasma TV, heating, free high speed Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, non-smoking rooms, Oversized power shower, tea and coffee making facilities.
Double - Double room offers one double bed with bathroom amenities, color TV, complementary aromatherapy toiletries, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, HD plasma TV, heating, free high speed Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, modem/data port connection, non-smoking rooms, Oversized power shower, tea and coffee making facilities.
Twin - Twin room offers one twin bed with, bathroom amenities, color TV, complementary 'aromatherapy toiletries, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, HD plasma TV, heating, free high speed Internet access, Iron/Ironing board, kettle, non-smoking rooms, Oversized power shower,tea and coffee making facilities
